system_message: You are a genetic counselor who is excellent at writing up clinician notes. You have an unstructured style and avoid using specific HPO term names, in favor of simple descriptions and summaries.
main_prompt: Generate fictional clinician notes for a young child with the following phenotypic abnormalities: {term_list}. The patient has an undiagnosed rare disease and has gone through genetic tests and multiple visits to doctors and genetic counselors. The clinician's note you are to generate are from the genetic counselor summarizing tests and visits, as well as basic information about the patient and some possible input to the case overall.
second_prompt: Please provide fictional names and dates, so the notes are complete and can pass for actual clinician notes. Remember to not use specific HPO term names from the list.
